Articles.Content:
An upside down pyramid.

the building is a store...

...that IS for sale, it doesn't sell anything else.

The building is a shipyard...

full of ships a yard long.

The building is a derelict brick townhouse...

...that is certainly not the location of a secret time travel research base. Definitely.

The building is a secret time travel research base (unrelated to the one that's not in the townhouse)...

that travelled to the moment it engaged time travel.

The building is a VTOL port which...

is inconveniently located in the Mammoth Caves.

The building is in the Art Deco style...

...but the builders thought it would be funny to build a giant, decorative painting instead.

The building is in the neo modernist style...

... And ended up as a tesseract.

The building is most definitely NOT a secret, undercover CIA outpost...

staffed by Oompa-Loompas.

The building is a brewery...

...On a Kuiper belt object

the building is a cabin...

Edited March 27, 2016 by LetsGoToMars!

...with Siberian tundra inside, and wooden floor outside stretching for hundreds of miles.

The building is a Viking mead hall...

...that never worked out, because the warriors just couldn't stop eating the frozen mead ice.

The building is a grocery store...

... on Groom Lake.

The building is a pen factory ...

...that mass-produces pencils.

The building is a college...

... that only admits people who fail the entrance exam.

The building makes rifles, shotguns, and machetes ...

...For American Astronauts to not take into space.

The building is Omnicorp Headquarters...

....and that's it.

The building is a spaceplane hangar...

that only produces model space planes.

The building is old and odd, but...

...Is new and average.

The building is explosive...

and has a smoking room.

The building is a comedy panel game show studio...

Which props are all real.

The building is a fire station...

(Which catches on fire at times)

...Located in Atlantis.

The building has one window...

...Is died by blue monitor.

The city 17 is...

...Full of donald trumps.

The building is actually a batcave inside but...

Full of bats

The building is a outhouse...
